trans-unit.source: Manages the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects for any object that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 為繼承 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 類別的任何物件管理 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Each Windows Form has at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> object that manages the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the form.
trans-unit.target: 每個 Windows Form 至少有一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>管理物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>表單的物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is abstract, the return type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property is either a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>類別是抽象的傳回型別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the <xref:System.Type> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源是否可以傳回的單一屬性 （而不是物件的清單），物件<xref:System.Type>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>做為資料來源，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>傳回。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果資料來源物件，用於實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>傳回。

trans-unit.source: For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 上每個資料來源，則會有單一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>。

trans-unit.source: Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> enables you to retrieve any particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associated with a data source.
trans-unit.target: 因為可能會有多個資料來源相關聯的 Windows Form<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>可讓您擷取任何特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>與資料來源相關聯。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>新建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會導致一些混淆，因為傳回的物件可能不會管理清單 （或任何清單），您想。

trans-unit.source: To prevent returning an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the intended <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免傳回無效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>方法來判斷所需的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>已經存在。

trans-unit.source: If you use a container control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, to contain data-bound controls, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for just that container control and its controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用容器控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，包含資料繫結控制項，您可以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>如只要該容器控制項及其子控制項。

trans-unit.source: Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您的表單中的每個部分可受自己<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor for more information about creating multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the same data source.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，如需有關建立多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>相同的資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of that form.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項至表單和資料集時，控制項中的資料表資料行與其進行通訊的繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>該表單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>, in turn, talks to the specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for that data association.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>，，反過來特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>針對該資料關聯。

trans-unit.source: If you queried the `Position` property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, it would report the current record for the binding of that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您查詢`Position`屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>，它會報告目前的記錄，該繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for the form it is on.
trans-unit.target: 在下列程式碼範例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項繫結至`FirstName`資料行`Customers`資料表`dataSet1`透過資料集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>表單上。

trans-unit.source: You can add a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增第二個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項 (`TextBox2`) 加入表單並繫結至`LastName`資料行`Customers`資料表中相同的資料集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>所知的第一個繫結 (`TextBox1`至`Customers.FirstName`)，因此它會使用相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>，因為這兩個文字方塊中會繫結至相同的資料集 (`DataSet1`)。

trans-unit.source: If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates and manages a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將繫結`TextBox2`不同資料集，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>建立及管理第二個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>。

trans-unit.source: It is important to be consistent about how you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> properties; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors.
trans-unit.target: 請務必保持一致，有關如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>屬性，否則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>建立多個貨幣管理員相同的資料集，會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範幾個方式可設定的內容以及其相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定使用下列方法，其中的屬性，只要您是在整個程式碼一致。

trans-unit.source: Most Windows Forms applications bind through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的 Windows Form 應用程式透過繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component encapsulates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> programming interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件封裝<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>程式設計介面。

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> for binding, you should use the members exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>繫結，您應該使用所公開的成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>操作 [貨幣] (也就是`Position`)，而不用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to bind five controls—a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> and four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls—to several data sources.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立四個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>以五個控制項繫結物件 —<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>和第四個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項 — 至數個資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is then used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for each data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>然後用來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>每個資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instances for the same data source, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and set it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of an object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要有多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>執行個體相同的資料來源，建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>並將它設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>屬性之物件的繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects (from two different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects), you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to different values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>物件 (從兩個不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>物件)，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>的每個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>為不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致資料繫結控制項以顯示相同的資料來源中的不同值的每一組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates two new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects and assigns each object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立兩個新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>物件，並將指派給每一個物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: `GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class).
trans-unit.target: `GroupBox1` 包含`TextBox1`，和`GroupBox2`包含`TextBox2`(這透過使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>類別)。

trans-unit.source: The example then adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, binding each to the same data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>到兩個物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>繫結至相同的資料來源和資料成員的每個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows two event handlers that use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controls to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property on different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範使用兩個事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控制項設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>上不同屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入與特定資料來源相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 至集合中。

trans-unit.source: The object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 加入與特定資料來源相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 至集合中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="listManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listManager" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 清除任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: Always raises a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> when handled.
trans-unit.target: 處理時一定會引發 <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged> event is obsolete and always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged>事件已經過時，一定會引發<xref:System.NotImplementedException>時處理。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 發生於所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 是否含有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 是否包含與指定資料來源相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>的可能資料來源與建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結的相關資訊的類別清單。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using only a data source.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性有關傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>使用資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists for each control on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>方法，以判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>存在每個控制項在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The example passes each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the method.
trans-unit.target: 範例會將每個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The information needed to resolve to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 解析至特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 是否包含與指定資料來源和資料成員相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>類別，如需可能資料來源的清單，以及如需建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結資訊。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using a data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性有關傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>使用資料來源和資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to test whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists before attempting to get it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>方法來測試是否特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>存在才能嘗試取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合是唯讀，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是衍生自 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，而且會加以覆寫，如此一定會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 與特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 相關的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之資料來源相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 指定之資料來源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> you want does not require a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用這個多載<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>想不需要導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects that use an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, no navigation path is required.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>管理一組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>物件使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>，任何的導覽路徑為必要項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, and never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性一律會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，而且永遠不傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>類別，如需可能資料來源的清單，以及如需建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects: one for a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, one for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and one for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> that belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>物件： 一個用於<xref:System.Data.DataView>，下列其中一個針對<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，，另一個用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 與特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 相關的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A navigation path containing the information that resolves to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽路徑，包含解析至特定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之資料來源和資料成員相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 指定之資料來源和資料成員的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects for which the data source contains multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>管理一組<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>資料來源包含多個物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain several <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects linked by <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.DataSet>只能包含數個<xref:System.Data.DataTable>所連結的物件<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>物件。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，瀏覽路徑，才能啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>傳回正確<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, when the `dataMember` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>屬性一律會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，當`dataMember`參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: It will never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 它永遠不會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>類別，如需可能資料來源的清單，以及如需建立控制項與資料來源之間的繫結資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>管理清單中，瀏覽路徑必須也會以清單結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code binds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the order date in a table of orders.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>訂購日期的 orders 資料表中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The navigation path includes the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 導覽路徑中包含<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>，而<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> must be retrieved using only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (which resolves to a list).
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>必須使用只抓取<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>（這會解析為清單）。

trans-unit.source: When returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, you should use the same data source as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> and modify only the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>，您應該使用相同的資料來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>和修改導覽路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A>方法來判斷所需<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>已經存在。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for a particular binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>特定繫結。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>以確保當控制值的其中一個變更時繫結至相同的資料來源的多個控制項都能保持同步。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`InitializeControlsAndData`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="dataMember" /> does not exist within the data source.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="dataMember" /> 不存在於資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 相關而要移除的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 刪除與指定資料來源相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> 相關而要移除的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 移除與指定資料來源相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: 要複製到其中的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />。

trans-unit.source: The collection index to begin copying from.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製的集合索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection into a specified array, starting at the collection index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的項目複製到指定的陣列中 (從集合索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> objects managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> 管理的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 物件總數。

trans-unit.source: The number of data sources managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 管理的資料來源數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> objects managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會傳回的數目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>物件管理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否同步處理集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合為安全執行緒 (Thread Safe)，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是衍生自 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，而且會加以覆寫，如此一定會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object to use for synchronization (thread safety).
trans-unit.target: 取得用來進行同步處理的物件 (安全執行緒)。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />, and is overridden to always return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，而且會加以覆寫，如此一定會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得此集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method allows you to iterate over the collection managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A>方法可讓您逐一查看集合受<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 產生關聯的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to associate with the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 產生關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> with a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> 與新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> 產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended update the bindings of components that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, when their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是更新的元件，可實作的繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>，當其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>變更。
